name: deodar
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an evergreen tree (= one that never loses its leaves) originally from the Himalayas, with thin leaves called needles and large cones (= hard, oval-shaped fruits): The deodar is a most graceful tree. I have a deodar cedar in my garden that I planted about 20 years ago.
[ U ] the wood of the deodar tree, used in building: Deodar wood is sought after for building because it is hard and rot resistant. Forests have been illegally felled, especially to obtain high-grade deodar.
